messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
Hi Fred, my name is Emma.
Nice to meet you, Emma. How can I assist you today?
I'm interested in learning more about the nutritional information of Nespresso Coffee Capsules. Can you help me with that?
Absolutely, Emma! Nespresso Coffee Capsules are designed to provide a premium coffee experience with high-quality ingredients. Are you looking for specific nutritional details or general information?
I'd like to know about the calories, sugars, and any other notable nutritional content.

Sure thing! A typical Nespresso Coffee Capsule contains around 2 calories per serving, and it has no added sugars or fats. The capsules are primarily made of coffee, so they are very low in any other nutrients.
That's great to hear! It's good to know that they are low in calories and sugars. Are there any other nutritional aspects I should be aware of?

Nespresso Capsules are quite straightforward. They do not contain any significant amounts of proteins, fats, or carbohydrates. The primary ingredient is high-quality coffee, which provides a rich flavor without adding extra calories.
Thank you so much, Fred. This information is very helpful. I appreciate your time and assistance.
You're welcome, Emma! I'm glad I could help. If you have any other questions about our products, feel free to ask.
Will do, Fred. Have a great day!
You too, Emma! Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service.
